attributes.action: Allow those working on Christmas Day to celebrate with family on another day
attributes.background: Restrictions to households meeting have been relaxed for Christmas Day, but key workers in Children & Adult Care Homes, hospitals, police etc will be working that day. Please allow them to celebrate Christmas with ltd extended family on a day other than 25th December.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564244
